txt.en: Elrond of Rivendell has sent scouts into Eregion to cover the path of the Company of the Ring and also to drive forth the spies of Saruman the White from the ancient home of the Noldor in Middle-earth.

You have journeyed into Eregion, the ancient home of the Elves who now dwell in Rivendell. Elrond's people seek to hide the passage of the Company of the Ring, but also to drive forth the forces of Saruman the White....
